content.rendered:
Let’s get right to the point: Your vehicle’s engine is its most important component. Without a working engine, you’re not going anywhere, no matter how many bells and whistles your vehicle has. Unfortunately, even people who take great care of their vehicles may sooner or later suffer a serious breakdown. Given this reality, in today’s tight economy, you can save a lot of money by buying  used engine parts or a used engine in Chicago. A Quick Word on Used Engine Parts 

Used engines and parts are exactly what you think they are – they are parts that were previously in use on another vehicle. However, used doesn’t mean worthless or risky to use on your vehicle. It’s just not the case, especially when you buy your parts from Aero Auto Parts. 

Many vehicles are junked and discarded for various reasons, some have barely been driven before they are totaled in an accident. Others may sit for years in a garage, unused because they never were repaired. In either of these instances, these vehicles have a lot of salvageable, usable parts. And those parts can be used to repair your vehicle and save you a lot of money in the process.  

Another positive aspect of used parts is that they are usually OEM (original equipment manufacturer) parts. These often fit better, last longer, and are overall better parts than even brand new aftermarket versions. 

Used Engines and Engine Parts from Aero Auto Parts

If you still have some hesitancy about buying and installing used engine parts or a used engine in your vehicle, you can set that hesitancy aside when you come to Aero Auto Parts. We’ve been providing used parts and engines to Chicago area motorists and repair shops for over 50 years, and we’ll sell you nothing but the highest quality discount auto parts – you have our word on that!

All vehicles brought to our yard are carefully dismantled and only OEM parts or very high quality aftermarket parts (parts not made by the original manufacturer) are added to our inventory of used parts. 

For good measure, at Aero Auto Parts, we meet and exceed all state and federal environmental regulations. Our technicians are experts at dismantling vehicles in ways that ensure environmental compliance and your complete safety.

Buy With Confidence at Aero Auto Parts 

Whatever vehicle engine or car parts you need, for either domestic or foreign vehicles, the chances are, we have what you’re looking for at Aero Auto Parts. We sell both retail and wholesale, and you can shop our inventory of used parts and engines online. 

For the best deals on used engines for sale and cheap auto parts in Chicago, IL, as well as friendly, knowledgeable customer service, come see us at Aero Auto Parts. We have the quality you want at the prices you can afford!
